description: Germany says Alexei Navalny was poisoned by a Novichok agent but the Kremlin denies any involvement.
title: Alexei Navalny blames Vladimir Putin for poisoning him
title_page: Alexei Navalny blames Vladimir Putin for poisoning him - BBC News
maintext: Mr Navalny has already mocked the claim online, wondering whether the CIA was "instructing" him on his physiotherapy, as that's all he's been doing since his release from hospital. He's threatened to sue for what he called a "monstrous lie", which he believes is meant to distract Russians from what the Kremlin "needs to hide".
